text: The 57th New York Film Festival took place from September 27 to October 13, 2019. == Main slate == {| class="wikitable" width="100%" |- !English title !Original title !Director(s) !Country ! |- |colspan="2"|The Irishman (Opening Night)||Martin Scorsese||||rowspan="29"| |- |colspan="2"|Marriage Story (Centerpiece)||Noah Baumbach|| |- |colspan="2"|Motherless Brooklyn (Closing Night)||Edward Norton|| |- ! colspan="4"| |- |Atlantics||Atlantique||Mati Diop|| |- |colspan="2"|Bacurau||Kleber Mendonça Filho, Juliano Dornelles|| |- |colspan="2"|Beanpole||Kantemir Balagov|| |- |Fire Will Come||O que arde||Oliver Laxe|| |- |colspan="2"|First Cow||Kelly Reichardt|| |- |A Girl Missing ||よこがお Yokogao||Koji Fukada|| |- |I Was at Home, But||Ich war zuhause, aber||Angela Schanelec|| |- |Freedom||Liberté||Albert Serra|| |- |colspan="2"|Martin Eden||Pietro Marcello|| |- |The Moneychanger||Así habló el cambista||Federico Veiroj|| |- |Oh Mercy!||Roubaix, une lumière||Arnaud Desplechin|| |- |Pain and Glory||Dolor y gloria||Pedro Almodóvar|| |- |Parasite||기생충 Gisaengchung||Bong Joon-ho|| |- |Portrait of a Lady on Fire||Portrait de la jeune fille en feu||Céline Sciamma|| |- |colspan="2"|Saturday Fiction||Lou Ye|| |- |colspan="2"|Sybil||Justine Triet|| |- |Synonyms||Synonymes||Nadav Lapid|| |- |To the Ends of the Earth||旅のおわり世界のはじまり Tabi no Owari, Sekai no Hajimari||Kiyoshi Kurosawa|| |- |The Traitor||Il traditore||Marco Bellocchio|| |- |Varda by Agnès||Varda par Agnès||Agnès Varda|| |- |colspan="2"|Vitalina Varela||Pedro Costa|| |- |colspan="2"|Wasp Network||Olivier Assayas|| |- |The Whistlers||La Gomera||Corneliu Porumboiu|| |- |The Wild Goose Lake||南方车站的聚会 Nan Fang Che Zhan De Ju Hui||Diao Yinan|| |- |Young Ahmed ||Le Jeune Ahmed||Jean-Pierre Dardenne, Luc Dardenne|| |- |colspan="2"|Zombi Child||Bertrand Bonello|| |} == References == Category:New York Film Festival Category:2019 film festivals Category:2019 in New York City
